titles.title: Nutrition and Health Information Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a biennial report on nutrition and health by the Surgeon General of the Public Health Service, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9296-9298)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 7/22/1993--Introduced. Nutrition and Health Information Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require the Surgeon General to report biennially on the relationship between nutrition and health. Authorizes appropriations.
